Testing Various Quote Characters

This page contains the same content with different Unicode quote characters to test pattern matching robustness.

ASCII Quotes

Standard ASCII quotes: "fid":"123", "view_mode":"full"

Left/Right Single Quotes (U+2018/U+2019)

Curly single quotes: 'fid':'456', 'view_mode':'preview'

Left/Right Double Quotes (U+201C/U+201D)

Curly double quotes: "fid":"789", "view_mode":"compact"

Prime Characters (U+2033/U+2034)

Prime quotes: ″fid″:″1011″, ″view_mode″:″full″

Mixed Quotes

Mixed styles: ["fid":'1213', "view_mode":'wide']

WordPress Embed with Various Quotes

Standard: [[{"fid":"123","view_mode":"full"}]]

Curly: [[{'fid':'456','view_mode':'preview'}]]

Mixed: [[{"fid":'789',"view_mode":'compact'}]]

Field Variations

Test matching with different field names and values

"fid": "field_id_123" 'fid': 'another_id' "view_mode":"thumbnail" 'view_mode':'fullscreen' "type":"media"

Escaped Characters

Escaped quotes: \"fid\":\"999\", \"view_mode\":\"test\"

HTML Entities

HTML encoded: "fid":"555", "view_mode":"preview"
